Ammo Values/Mass of small solid iron sho: Mass of small solid iron shots
Ammo Values/Shell Rocket Description: Spherical head filled with black powder
Ammo Values/Shell Rocket Small Descripti: Shorter range rocket filled with black powder
Connection Errors/AuthenticateInstructio:
You are unable to authenticate with Steam. You must be connected to Steam in order to play.
Attempt the below troubleshooting method:

1. Log out from Steam.
2. Log back in on Steam.
3. Relaunch Holdfast: Nations At War.
Connection Errors/CheckInternetConnectio: You are unable to connect to the server. Ensure that your internet connection is stable.
Connection Errors/ContactServerAdminToUp: Contact the server administrator in question to update the server.
Connection Errors/ContactServerAdministr: Contact the server administrator in question to appeal your ban.
Connection Errors/DeniedAccessToTheServe: You have been denied access to the server.
Connection Errors/DownloadBySteamInstruc:
1. Exit Holdfast: Nations At War.
2. Locate Holdfast: Nations At War in your Steam game library.
3. Right Click on Holdfast: Nations At War then select ‘Properties’ from the dropdown menu.
4. Go to the ‘Local Files’ tab.
5. Click on the ‘Verify Integrity Of Game Files…’ button.
6. Wait until Steam finishes verifying game files then relaunch the game.
You can force Steam to download the latest version by doing the following:
Connection Errors/EnsureToAbideByTheRule: Ensure that you abide by the rules of the server.
Connection Errors/EnteredPasswordIsIncor: The password you entered is incorrect.
Connection Errors/GameClientNotUpdated: Holdfast: Nations At War has been updated! Restart the game to download the latest version.
Connection Errors/GameServerNotUpdated: Game server is not up to date with the latest version of Holdfast: Nations War.
Connection Errors/JoinAnotherServerOrWai: Please join another server or wait until a slot becomes available.
Connection Errors/PasswordsAreCaseSensit: Passwords are case-sensitive. Ensure that your ‘Caps Lock’ key isn’t on.
Connection Errors/RequestFurtherAssistan: Request further assistance on Discord. Error ID is
Connection Errors/ServerWasShutdown: Server was shut down. Please join another server to continue playing.
Connection Errors/TroubleshootInstructio:
1. Log out then back in on Steam.
2. Restart your internet connection.
3. Restart your router.
4. Temporarily disable any anti-virus or firewall that may otherwise be blocking your connection.
5. Ensure that you are not operating behind a VPN.
6. Verify the integrity of your game files through Steam.
7. Ensure that you are not running Steam in 'Offline Mode'. You must be connected to Steam in order to play.
8. Go to your '\AppData\LocalLow\Anvil Game Studio' and delete the 'Holdfast NaW' folder.
8.1. Take a backup of the 'muteplayerschat' and 'muteplayersvoip' text files as these contain your muted player information.
9. Attempt to connect through a friend on Steam.
10. Try using another internet connection if available.
Attempting the below troubleshooting methods is also recommended:
Connection Errors/YouAreStillConnected: You are still connected to the server. Wait a short while longer before attempting to re-join.
Connection Errors/YouHaveBeenDisconnecte: You have been disconnected from the server.
Connection Errors/YouHaveBeenKickedByAnA: You have been kicked by an administrator.
Connection Errors/YouMustBeConnectedToSt:
Ensure that you are not running Steam in ‘Offline Mode’. You must be connected to Steam in order to play.
Attempting the below troubleshooting methods is also recommended:

1. Go to your '\AppData\LocalLow\Anvil Game Studio' and delete the 'Holdfast NaW' folder.
2. Restart your router.
3. Log out then back in on Steam.
Death Screen Panel/Failed to adhere by t: Failed to adhere by the rules
DefensiveEmplacements/CannotPlaceObject: You cannot place the object here.
DefensiveEmplacements/EmplacementBuildLi: Cannot build {0}, as there are too many objects of this type.
DefensiveEmplacements/HammerNotEquipped: You need an equipped hammer for this action.
DefensiveEmplacements/NotEnoughMaterials: Your faction does not have enough materials to build this object.
Friendly Fire Notifications/Youve hit a: You’ve hit a friendly player! Watch out.
Game Mode Information Details/AttackersC: Attackers! Capture all primary objectives before the timer runs out. Co-ordinate assaults and use artillery to breach defences. Loss of life from the ‘forlorn hope’ is a necessary sacrifice.
Game Mode Information Details/Brawl: An all-out brawl! Reach a set number of kills to become victorious.
Game Mode Information Details/ControlAnd: Control and conquer! Defend and capture objectives around the map to become victorious.
Game Mode Information Details/DefendersP: Defenders! Prevent the assaulting forces from capturing your primary objectives. You need to survive until the round timer runs out with limited reinforcement. Make good use of cover.
Defenders! Prevent the invading forces from capturing your coastal fortification. Your reinforcements are limited. Man the fort's guns and keep the invaders at bay.
Game Mode Information Details/EveryoneIs: Everyone is your enemy. This also includes players from the same faction.
Game Mode Information Details/GatherTick: Gather tickets! Control more objectives than the enemy to gather tickets. This is key to winning the match.
Game Mode Information Details/InvadersCa: Invaders! Capture the opposing faction’s fortification. Make good use of rockets and cannon to breach defensive positions before marines and crewman land ashore.
Game Mode Information Details/LastStand: Last stand! One last chance at turning things in your favour once reinforcements deplete.
Game Mode Information Details/LimitedRei: Limited reinforcements! Be sure to strategise and co-ordinate. If they deplete, you’ll be unable to spawn anymore.
Game Mode Information Details/MeleeComba: Best your opponents in the melee arena! Devise strategies and time your strikes. Blocking is key to winning the match.
Game Mode Information Details/PlayTogeth: Play together! Co-ordinate assaults and devise strategies. Objectives cannot be captured unless your team is in greater numbers.
Game Mode Information Details/RaiseSails: Set sail! Raise sails by pressing [{0}] and lower them by pressing [{1}].
Game Mode Information Details/Rowboats: Ships don’t respawn once sunk! Use rowboats to board and crew allied ships should your vessel find its way to the bottom of the ocean floor.
Game Mode Information Details/SailWithTh: Sail with the wind! The direction of the arrow on the minimap determines the direction the wind is coming from. Turn the tide of battle in your favour.
Game Mode Information Details/SingleLife: Single life! You will have to wait for the round to finish before you can respawn should you meet your end. Make sure to use it well.
Game Mode Information Details/SinkEnemyS: Sink enemy ships! Make good use of chain and round shot to sink enemy vessels. Work with your crew mates towards this goal.
Game Mode Information Details/SpawningIn: Spawning in waves. Use this as an opportunity to assemble and organise.
Game Mode Information Details/Spyglass: Use a spyglass to identify friend from foe. All naval vessels fly the colours of their affiliated faction.
Game Tips/TipAdminHelp: Request the assistance of an official server administrator on Discord. Use the 'report-a-player' channel. A link to the Discord can be found in the pause menu by pressing the '{0}' key.
Game Tips/TipArtillery: Support the fight from the rear with artillery. Cannoneer and rocketeer classes excel at destroying fortified emplacements.
Game Tips/TipAutoRun: Press the '{0}' key to auto run.
Game Tips/TipCameraMode: Switch back and forth 1st and 3rd person views by pressing the '{0}' key.
Game Tips/TipCannonExplode: Loaded cannons will explode when destroyed. You better watch out!
Game Tips/TipCaptainPoints: Captains gather score for each and every shot that successfully hits an enemy vessel.
Game Tips/TipCapturePoints: Control and conquer! Defend and capture objectives around the map to become victorious. Captured objectives serve as forward spawn positions.
Game Tips/TipChainShot: Make use of chain shot to demast a ship. It is more effective than round shot for this task.
Game Tips/TipClassStats: Classes come with their own unique traits, abilities and equipment loadouts. Select the ‘attributes’ and ‘equipment’ tabs in the spawn menu to determine which class suits best your playstyle.
Game Tips/TipCoastalAttackers: Invaders! Capture the opposing faction’s fortification. Make good use of rockets and cannon to breach defensive positions before marines and crewman land ashore.
Game Tips/TipCoastalDefenders: Defenders! Prevent the invading forces from capturing your coastal fortification. Man the fort's guns and keep the invaders at bay.
Game Tips/TipCombatMode: Press '{0}' to go into melee. Slide your mouse towards your desired direction then left click to strike or right click to block.
Game Tips/TipDeathmatch: An all-out brawl! Reach a set number of kills to become victorious.
Game Tips/TipDiscordCommunity: Participate in organised events! Join the community Discord. A link to the Discord can be found in the pause menu by pressing the '{0}' key.
Game Tips/TipEquipLantern: Light your way through the dark or make known your position. Press '{0}' to equip the lantern.
Game Tips/TipEquipSpyglass: Sight friend or foe at a distance. Press the '{0}' key to equip the spyglass.
Game Tips/TipFiddling: You’ll instantly face your demise should you get stricken by a melee weapon while aiming or reloading.
Game Tips/TipFlagBearer: Parade your faction’s colours in the field of battle. Improve the rate at which firearms are reloaded when playing with the flag bearer class.
Game Tips/TipLimitedReinforcements: Limited reinforcements! Be sure to strategise and co-ordinate. If they deplete, you’ll be unable to spawn anymore.
Game Tips/TipMapBorders: You cannot endlessly sail the seven seas! Borders contain the engagement in a specific location.
Game Tips/TipMeleeArena: Best your opponents in the melee arena! Devise strategies and time your strikes. Blocking is key to winning the match.
Game Tips/TipMuteChat: Press '{0}' to mute specific individuals through chat.
Game Tips/TipMuteVoip: Press '{0}' to mute specific individuals through VoIP.
Game Tips/TipOfficerIssueOrder: Steadfast the men. Issue orders with the infantry officer class by pressing the '{0}' key to provide the rank and file with firearm accuracy and melee damage bonuses.
Game Tips/TipOrbitCamera: Pay attention to your surroundings! Hold the '{0}' key to look around.
Game Tips/TipRaiseSail: Set sail! Raise sails by pressing '{0}' and lower them by pressing '{1}'.
Game Tips/TipRandomPiano: Enjoy a moment of respite and play a few tunes on the piano. You can find them inside buildings on various maps.
Game Tips/TipReceivedBuffs: Do your duty in the ranks. Line infantryman, grenadiers and guards receive firearm accuracy and melee damage bonuses by following an officer’s command.
Game Tips/TipRecruitmentChat: The recruitment chat channel can be toggled off through the ‘game’ settings.
Game Tips/TipReticleDesign: Customise your crosshair's appearance through the ‘game’ settings.
Game Tips/TipRiggingScout: Scout enemy vessels from a higher position by climbing to the fighting top. Look for an interaction icon next to the ship’s rigging.
Game Tips/TipSailWind: Take down your square-rigged sails by pressing the number keys when sailing into the wind. It will improve the ship’s manoeuvrability.
Game Tips/TipSailingDirection: Sail with the wind to gather a tactical advantage. The direction of the arrow on the minimap represents the direction the wind is coming from.
Game Tips/TipSapperConstruct: Fortify strategic positions with the sapper class. Press '{0}' to equip your hammer and construct defences.
Game Tips/TipShipGuns: Larger calibre guns deal more damage and have greater range. Each and every vessel is equipped with a different arsenal.
Game Tips/TipShipStern: Make sure the ship’s stern stays out of harm's way! Significant damage will be dealt if destroyed.
Game Tips/TipSiegeAttackers: Attackers! Capture all primary objectives before the timer runs out. Co-ordinate assaults and use artillery to breach defences. Loss of life from the ‘forlorn hope’ is a necessary sacrifice.
Game Tips/TipSiegeDefenders: Defenders! Prevent the assaulting forces from capturing your primary objectives. You need to survive until the round timer runs out with limited reinforcement. Make good use of cover.
Game Tips/TipSingleLife: Single life! You will have to wait for the round to finish before you can respawn should you meet your end. Make sure to use it well.
Game Tips/TipSinkVessels: Sink enemy ships! Make good use of chain and round shot to sink enemy vessels. Work with your crew mates towards this goal.
Game Tips/TipSkirmish: Not too keen on standing in ranks? Skirmish with the rifleman or light infantry classes and pick targets from a distance.
Game Tips/TipStrategicCapture: Play together! Co-ordinate assaults and devise strategies. Objectives cannot be captured unless your team is in greater numbers.
Game Tips/TipStunOpponent: Bash your foe with melee secondary attacks when things get really up close and personal. Press '{0}' when wielding a melee weapon to stun your opponent.
Game Tips/TipSupportMusician: Pomp and circumstance. Support the rank and file with firearm accuracy by playing tunes into battle while playing as a Musician. Press '{0}' followed by a '{1}'.
Game Tips/TipSurgeonHealing: Hold the '{0}' key to heal other players while playing the surgeon class. You gather score when healing other players.
Game Tips/TipSwitchChannels: Switch between chat channels by pressing the '{0}' key while typing.
Game Tips/TipVoipSpeak: Press '{0}' to speak to other players through VoIP. Ladies and gentleman, remember to be respectful.
Game Tips/TipWaveSpawn: Spawning in waves. Use this as an opportunity to assemble and organise.
GameplayHints/SwitchToFirearmHint: Press '{0}' to switch to firearm mode
GameplayHints/SwitchToMeleeHint: Press '{0}' to switch to melee mode
GameplayHints/VOIPMuteEveryone: Press '{0}' to turn off voice chat
GameplayHints/VOIPUnmuteEveryone: Press '{0}' to turn on voice chat
GameplayHints/HorsebackRider/HaltDescrip: Press '{0}' to instantly halt the horse
GameplayHints/Medic/Description: Hold '{0}' to heal a nearby ally
Hardcore Game Type Information Details/E: Enemies don't show on the minimap when they fire their weapons. Pay attention to your surroundings!
Hardcore Game Type Information Details/F: Friendlies are only shown on the minimap at a close distance. Officers must pay close attention to the on-goings on the battlefield!
Hardcore Game Type Information Details/Y: Your accuracy with firearms over long distances is reduced. The distance at which you engage your enemy is vital to increase your success at hitting your target!
Your ammunition is limited. Every shot counts!
Interactable Objects/FullMeleeWeapons: You Can't Carry More Melee Weapons
Main Menu Development Panel/Join Discord: Join Discord! Participate in organised events.
Main Menu Development Panel/Thank you fo: Thank you for supporting Holdfast: Nations At War!
Main Menu Development Panel/We are activ: We are actively developing the game based on community feedback. Work on improving melee combat is ongoing to continue promote competitiveness. - Anvil Game Studios
Notifications/Assister: You’re assisting another player move the cannon.
Notifications/BorderWarning: You’re going out of the battlefield. Sail back!
Notifications/CanPlaceLadder: You may drop the ladder at this position.
Notifications/CannotLoad: You cannot load your ammo in this artillery piece.
Notifications/CannotPlaceObject: You cannot place the object here.
Notifications/EmplacementBuildLimitExcee: Cannot build {0}, as there are too many objects of this type.
Notifications/EnemyShipCaptured: We have captured the enemy vessel {0}!
Notifications/EnemyShipSunk: We have sunk the enemy vessel {0}!
Notifications/ExitPositionError: Cannon is positioned too close to an object. You are unable to aim.
Notifications/FriendlyShipCaptured: The allied vessel {0} has been captured!
Notifications/FriendlyShipSunk: The allied vessel {0} has been sunk!
Notifications/HammerNotEquipped: You need a hammer equipped to perform this action.
Notifications/Kicked: A Cannoneer has taken control of this artillery piece.
Notifications/LadderAssistJoined: A player is assisting you. The ladder can now be carried at a faster pace.
Notifications/LadderAssistLeft: You are no longer being assisted.
Notifications/LadderAssister: You're assisting another player to move the ladder.
Notifications/LadderKicked: A Carpenter has taken control of this ladder.
Notifications/LadderMover: You have control over the ladder. Press ‘{0}’ to move forward.
Notifications/LadderPlacedInPosition: The ladder has been placed in its position. You may press '{0}' to raise the ladder.
Notifications/LoadingPositionError: Cannon is positioned too close to an object. You are unable to load.
Notifications/Mover: You have control over the cannon. Press ‘{0}’ to move forward.
Notifications/NeedAmmo: You are not carrying any ammunition.
Notifications/NotEnoughMaterials: Your faction does not have enough materials to build this object.
Notifications/RammingPositionError: Cannon is positioned too close to an object. You are unable to ram.
Notifications/RocketAssister: You're assisting another player to move the rocket launcher.
Notifications/RocketAssisterJoined: A player is assisting you. The launcher can now be carried at a faster pace.
Notifications/RocketAssisterLeft: You are no longer being assisted.
Notifications/RocketCannotMount: Rocket launcher cannot be unpacked close to an object. You are unable to unpack here.
Notifications/RocketKicked: A {0} has taken control of this artillery piece.
Notifications/RocketMover: You have control over the rocket launcher. Press ‘{0}’ to move forward.
Notifications/RocketPlayerClassCannotDis: You must be a Cannoneer or Rocketeer to pack the rocket launcher.
Notifications/RocketPlayerClassCannotMou: You must be a Cannoneer or Rocketeer to unpack the rocket launcher.
Notifications/RowboatAssist: You're assisting another player to manoeuvre the rowboat.
Notifications/RowboatSpawnBlocked: Unable to launch rowboat. Spawn is obstructed.
Notifications/SwivelGunCannotCarryByClas: You must be a Sapper to carry the swivel gun.
Notifications/TooManyItemsLimit: Your faction cannot build more of this object.
Options/Audio/The Speaker Mode can only: The speaker mode can only be adjusted from the main menu
Options/Game/Playe Name Settings can onl: Player name settings can only be adjusted from the main menu
Options/Game/Crosshair/WarningMessage: Crosshair changes are only visible upon spawning
Options/Game/DLC/Warning: DLC settings can only be adjusted from the main menu. It doesn't and never will impact gameplay.
PlayerAbilities/ArtilleryOperatorDescrip: Well versed in the operation of various artillery pieces. You have priority over the use of field guns, siege guns and mortars.
PlayerAbilities/BreakRankAndFollowDescri: Instruct the rank and file to break their ranks and follow. Make use of this to let the men know you’re moving position.
PlayerAbilities/CarpentryBasics: Specialises in woodworks. You are able to repair damaged naval vessels and cannon.
PlayerAbilities/CeaseFireDescription: Instruct the rank and file to cease fire. Make use of this to let the gentlemen know they should stop firing.
PlayerAbilities/ChargeDescription: Rally your men before a glorious charge and order them to move forward with bayonets equipped. You significantly increase melee damage and reduce damage by firearms for a short period of time.
PlayerAbilities/EngineeringBasicsDescrip: Basic training in the construction of military works. You can assist other engineers build defensive emplacements and construct anti-infantry stakes.
PlayerAbilities/EngineeringSpecialistDes: Well versed in the construction of military works. You are able to enact various defensive emplacements and repair cannon.
PlayerAbilities/ExplosivesHandlingDescri: Well versed in the handling of explosives. You are able to carry explosives.
PlayerAbilities/FireAtWillDescription: Instruct the rank and file to commence fire at their own will. You increase firearm accuracy of all those good men standing in line by {0}%.
PlayerAbilities/FireDescription: Instruct the rank and file to commence glorious volley fire. You increase firearm accuracy of all those good men that act on your order by {0}%.
PlayerAbilities/FormLineDescription: Instruct the rank and file to form line for glorious musket volley fire to follow. Use the scroll wheel to rotate the marker.
PlayerAbilities/GuardsmanDescription: Duty bound to guard the high-command. You reduce the damage dealt to nearby allied officers and surgeons by {0}% (Stacks {1} times).
PlayerAbilities/HighCommandArmyDescripti: An officer in command. You are able to issue orders to the rank and file.
PlayerAbilities/HighCommandNavalDescript: A captain in command. You have priority over sailing a naval vessel.
PlayerAbilities/HorsebackRidingDescripti: Trained in the art of horseback riding. You are able to mount and ride glorious steeds of war.
PlayerAbilities/MakeReadyDescription: Instruct the rank and file to make ready their muskets. Infantryman standing in line will receive an order to aim their firearms in preparation for volley fire to commence.
PlayerAbilities/MedicineDescription: Well versed in the field of medicine. You are able to heal wounded players.
PlayerAbilities/MusicianDescription: Pomp and circumstance. You increase firearm accuracy of the rank and file by {0}%. Bonus stacks upwards to {1}% if another musician plays a tune with you.
PlayerAbilities/RankAndFileDescription:
Drills, drills and more drills. Your extensive discipline allows you to receive firearm accuracy and melee damage bonuses from orders given by officers. You also gather benefits from musicians and flag bearers.

Additional score is given for killing or maiming someone while standing in line.
PlayerAbilities/ReinforceDescription:
Inform the high-command and other gentlemen in the ranks that you’re in dire need of reinforcements. A beacon will be placed on your location.
These can be toggled on and off by the same key press.
PlayerAbilities/RocketOperatorDescriptio: Well versed in the operation of rockets. You have priority over the use of rocket launchers.
PlayerAbilities/StandardBearerDescriptio:
Parade your faction’s colours in the field of battle. You improve the rate at which firearms are reloaded for the rank and file by {0}% when your flag is equipped.

You also further increase the chance of survival to those in the ranks sporting the ‘Orderly’ trait when shot at by firearms.
PlayerClassDescriptions/ArmyInfantryOffi: Leads his men to victory. Commands the rank and file.
PlayerClassDescriptions/ArmyLineInfantry: Steadfast. Well trained with the use of muskets.
Steadfast. Well trained with the use of muskets.
PlayerClassDescriptions/Bagpiper: Plays fine melodies. Supports the rank and file with bonuses.
PlayerClassDescriptions/Cannoneer: Cannoneer. Great at destroying fortified emplacements.
PlayerClassDescriptions/Carpenter: Axe wielder. Great at destroying enemy emplacements.
PlayerClassDescriptions/CoastGuard: Guards fortifications. Muskets and cannon are his forte.
PlayerClassDescriptions/Customs: Skirmisher on patrol. Moves about at a greater pace.
PlayerClassDescriptions/Drummer: Plays fine melodies. Supports the rank and file with bonuses.
PlayerClassDescriptions/Fifer: Plays fine melodies. Supports the rank and file with bonuses.
PlayerClassDescriptions/FlagBearer: Standard bearer. Supports the rank and file with bonuses.
PlayerClassDescriptions/Grenadier: Largest of soldiers. Increased melee survivability.
PlayerClassDescriptions/Guard: Elite infantry. Guards the high-command and excel in melee.
PlayerClassDescriptions/Hussar: Well-dressed. Great showmanship with swords on horseback.
PlayerClassDescriptions/LightInfantry: Quick footed skirmisher. Moves about at a greater pace.
PlayerClassDescriptions/NavalCaptain: Authority aboard a vessel. Commands the ship’s crew.
PlayerClassDescriptions/NavalMarine: Marine. Repels boarders and headways coastal invasions.
PlayerClassDescriptions/NavalSailor: Ship’s crew. Cutlass is their primary weapon of choice.
PlayerClassDescriptions/NavalSailor2: Veteran crewman. Spots enemy ships at the distance.
PlayerClassDescriptions/Rifleman: Sharpshooter. Picks infantryman from a distance.
PlayerClassDescriptions/Rocketeer: Rocketeer. Great at destroying fortified emplacements.
PlayerClassDescriptions/Sapper: Constructs defensive works. Supports allied troops.
PlayerClassDescriptions/Surgeon: Studies medicine. Supports allied troops by healing them.
PlayerClassDescriptions/Violinist: Plays fine melodies. Supports the rank and file with bonuses.
PlayerEquipment/1HAxeDescription: Swung with one-hand, this melee weapon is effective against both player-built constructions and infantryman alike.
PlayerEquipment/2HAxeDescription: Its sheer force makes this weapon’s use ideal when going against player-built defences.
PlayerEquipment/BagpipesDescription: A true scotsman weapon of choice. Gloriously pipe your way through the field of battle and support the rank and file. Press ‘{0}’ to equip this instrument.
PlayerEquipment/BayonetDescription: The musket’s pointy end. Attach it to your trusty firearm and make use of it as a spear by pressing '{0}'.
PlayerEquipment/BearingFlagDescription: Rally the troops. Fly your faction’s standard to support the rank and file.
PlayerEquipment/BlunderbussDescription: Shotgun. Capable of ending multiple infantryman at one go.
PlayerEquipment/BoardingPikeDescription: Fend off enemy crewman aboard your ship’s deck. Make use of its range to your advantage.
PlayerEquipment/CannonRamRodDescription: Make ready the guns. Ram field guns, long guns and artillery pieces or valiantly attempt to fend off enemies with it.
PlayerEquipment/CarbineDescription: Shorter, lighter and much easier to handle than a musket. It is preferred by units riding on horseback or those carrying heavy loads.
PlayerEquipment/ConstructingHammerDescri: Construct player-built defences, repair artillery or gently tap an unsuspecting fellow’s head. Press ‘{0}’ to equip the hammer and start constructing defences.
PlayerEquipment/CutlassDescription: A brutal slashing weapon primarily associated with naval troops. A scary choice for a close encounter.
PlayerEquipment/DeconstructingHammerDesc: Topple down enemy defences or deconstruct your own. Its relatively efficient at gathering back materials to construct defences with.
PlayerEquipment/FifeBritishDescription: Pomp and circumstance. Gloriously fife your way through the field of battle and support the rank and file. Press ‘{0}’ to equip this instrument.
PlayerEquipment/FifeFrenchDescription: Pomp and circumstance. Gloriously fife your way through the field of battle and support the rank and file. Press ‘{0}’ to equip this instrument.
PlayerEquipment/FifePrussianDescription: Pomp and circumstance. Gloriously fife your way through the field of battle and support the rank and file. Press ‘{0}’ to equip this instrument.
PlayerEquipment/FifeRussianDescription: Pomp and circumstance. Gloriously fife your way through the field of battle and support the rank and file. Press ‘{0}’ to equip this instrument.
PlayerEquipment/KnifeDescription: It’s better than doing the notorious deed with your bare fists.
PlayerEquipment/LanternDescription: Light your way through the dark or make known your position. Press ‘{0}’ to equip the lantern.
PlayerEquipment/LoyalistEditionDescripti: Slash and thrust. Firmly take hold of its hilt, rally the troops and make your stand. Loyalist exclusive cosmetic override.
PlayerEquipment/MarchingDrumBritishDescr: Pomp and circumstance. Gloriously drum your way through the field of battle and support the rank and file. Press ‘{0}’ to equip this instrument.
PlayerEquipment/MarchingDrumFrenchDescri: Pomp and circumstance. Gloriously drum your way through the field of battle and support the rank and file. Press ‘{0}’ to equip this instrument.
PlayerEquipment/MarchingDrumPrussianDesc: Pomp and circumstance. Gloriously drum your way through the field of battle and support the rank and file. Press ‘{0}’ to equip this instrument.
PlayerEquipment/MarchingDrumRussianDescr: Pomp and circumstance. Gloriously drum your way through the field of battle and support the rank and file. Press ‘{0}’ to equip this instrument.
PlayerEquipment/MusketDescription: Muzzle loaded firearm equipped with a pointy end. Manufactured en masse, they’re your best bet at making quick work of your enemy.
PlayerEquipment/Musket_NewLandLightInfan: New Land Light Infantry Pattern Brown Bess
PlayerEquipment/OfficerWeaponDescription: Slash and thrust. Firmly take hold of its hilt, rally the troops and make your stand.
PlayerEquipment/PistolDescription: Single-shot muzzle loaded firearm limited by its short range and damage but quick to reload. A solid defensive choice for a front-line unit.
PlayerEquipment/RifleDescription: Crackshot’s weapon of choice. Effective at long ranges, it's one firearm to be weary of.
PlayerEquipment/ShortBladedSwordDescript: Short-bladed sword. Equip this when things get up close and personal.
PlayerEquipment/SpadeDescription: Digging tool. Make use of it to raise earthworks and bolster your team’s defences.
PlayerEquipment/SpyglassDescription: Spot the enemy at a distance. Press ‘{0}’ to equip the spyglass.
PlayerEquipment/ViolinDescription: A slender neck, gracefully curved body and smooth finish. In the hands of a master, it sings like the haunting siren’s call. Press ‘{0}’ to equip this instrument.
PlayerTraits/AbleSwimmerDescription: Lightly equipped. Your swimming speed is increased by {0}%.
PlayerTraits/ArmouredDescription: Equipped with a cuirass that protects you from musket and pistol fire. You are guranteed to survive a single shot by a firearm.
PlayerTraits/AxeSpecialisationDescriptio: Excels with the use of axes. Your damage when wielding an axe is increased by {0}%. Your damage is also significantly increased when destroying player-built defences, doors and other military works.
PlayerTraits/BayonetSpecialisationDescri: Excels with the use of bayonets. Your damage when striking with a bayonet is increased by {0}%.
PlayerTraits/BlunderbussSpecialisationDe: Excels with the use of blunderbusses. Your damage when firing a blunderbuss is increased by {0}% and accuracy by {1}%.
PlayerTraits/CannonSpecialisationDescrip: Excels with the use and firing of cannons and mortars. Your ramming and pushing speed is increased by {0}%.
PlayerTraits/ChosenManDescription: The prestigious 95th. You're a chosen man! It makes you feel special.
PlayerTraits/DistinguishableDescription: Stand out from the rank and file. You appear differently on the mini-map.
PlayerTraits/EliteInfantryDescription: Heavily trained and experienced. The damage that you deal with melee weapons is increased by {0}%. You wield a musket with greater melee range than others.
PlayerTraits/ExplosivesSpecialistDescrip: Trained with the use of volatile explosives. The rate at which you move while carrying explosives is increased by {0}%.
PlayerTraits/LightFootedDescription: Fast and nimble. Your running speed is increased by {0}% but you deal less damage with melee weapons.
PlayerTraits/MarksmanDescription: Crack-shot. Your accuracy when using firearms is increased by {0}% but your reload speed is decreased by {1}%.
PlayerTraits/MountedFirearmSpecialisatio: Experienced with the use of firearms while on horseback. Your damage when firing pistols and carbines from horseback is increased by {0}% and accuracy by {1}%.
PlayerTraits/MountedSwordSpecialisationD: Drilled in various sword combat techniques while on horseback. Your damage when wielding a sword while on horseback is increased significantly.
PlayerTraits/MusketSpecialisationDescrip: Excels with the use of muskets. Your damage when firing a musket is increased by {0}%. You also deal {1}% more damage when striking with a bayonet.
PlayerTraits/NavigatorDescription: Navigator of the high seas. You improve the maneuverability of the naval vessel your are commanding by {0}%.
PlayerTraits/OrderlyDescription:
Strength in numbers. You significantly increase your chances of surviving shots from firearms at longer distances while standing in formation.

You must be standing in line for this trait to become active.
PlayerTraits/PikeSpecialisationDescripti: Excels with the use of boarding pikes. Your damage when wielding a pike increased by {0}%.
PlayerTraits/PistolSpecialisationDescrip: Excels with the use of pistols. Your damage when firing a pistol is increased by {0}% and accuracy by {1}%.
PlayerTraits/RankDisciplineDescription: Drilled and disciplined in the art of firing whilst in formation. Your accuracy when crouched and shooting with a firearm is increased by {0}%.
PlayerTraits/ResilientDescription: A strong sense of duty. Melee damage dealt to you by other players is reduced by {0}%.
PlayerTraits/RocketSpecialisationDescrip: Excels with the use and firing of rockets. Your loading speed is increased by {0}%.
PlayerTraits/SkilfulRiderDescription: Well-versed in the art of horseback riding. Your speed while riding a horse is increased by {0}%.
PlayerTraits/SkirmisherDescription: Drilled with knowledge on skirmishing tactics. Your accuracy when using firearms while crouching is increased by {0}% but you receive more damage when stricken by melee weapons.
PlayerTraits/SwordSpecialisationDescript: Excels with the use of swords. Your damage when wielding a sword is increased by {0}%.
